name: Ice Hockey Revamped
description:
In 202x Ice Hockey needed to be reformed to attract new audience. The task was clear - maximise fun. Using state of the art MELINDA (MachinE LearnIng aNd Data Analytics) AI entertainment scientific department of sport added all ice hockey related data to the machine and start waiting. After months of work, Melinda came up with a set of 10 new rules for the game. However, AI decided to do incremental roll-out of those rules as it will comply with the task in hand. Let us see what this AI has done with the game.

How to play:

WASD/Arrows to move, mouse to aim and use!

All, except particles, was done doing #GMTK2020 game jam
